Reviews.Title: “Great Location but very noisy”
Reviews.Author: Madrid99187069
Reviews.Content: returned 4 night stay hotel pros fantastic location – central restaurant bars walking distance friendly staff modern power shower clean cons noisy – drunks square morning 500am singing shouting echo air con breakfast – dining tables resulting delays breakfast mini bar expensive expect return maybe noise location location location

Reviews.Title: “Uncomfortable room temperature - poor night's sleep”
Reviews.Author: luvtravel808
Reviews.Content: positives stayed modern nice clean matched photos shown website expect european hotel class location central major sights 5 min walk puerta del sol hotel staff helpful questions negatives temperature extremely warm uncomfortable windows door cool acceptable temperature hotel air conditioning available time april fan using thermostat actually heater nice hotel note explaining thermostat guests don’t learning hard noisy night morning plaza del carmen hotel warm leave window people loitering lot noise outside window late night 8 morning difficult sleep laptop provided nice touch mouse cover missing missing laptop parents stayed extremely difficult navigate laptop essentially unusable summary wouldn’t choose stay mainly due uncomfortable hotel temperature amount noise generated people loitering plaza del carmen nearly impossible night sleep
